api_list.name: /validator
api_list.description: validate cron(Minutes Hours Day-of-month Month Day-of-week Year) expressions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cron.p.rapidapi.com/validator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cron.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
